content: crochet wisteria lapghan - keep yourself warm in the cooler evenings with this snuggly lapghan the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 41 inches x 42 inches level intermediate+ copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-wisteria-lapghan-pattern/
